column18: 08/17/2014: Assailants attacked an ebola quarantine center in Monrovia city, Montserrado county, Liberia. There were no reported casualties in the attack. No group claimed responsibility for the incident.
column64: The specific motive is unknown; however, sources noted that the assailants had yelled that the Ebola virus was not in Liberia and that the virus was solely a means for the Liberian president, Ellen Johnson Sirleaf, to receive financial resources.
column108: A quarantine center was damaged and looted in this attack.
column126: \\"\"Patients flee   attack   on Monrovia Ebola unit: witnesses"

column136: Liberia. There were no reported casualties as the device failed to ignite. No group claimed responsibility for the incident."
column182: The specific motive is unknown; however, sources suspected that Smith Toby may have been targeted because he refused to report along a particular narrative.
column215: A petrol bomb was used in the attack.
